question: Which organisation is to launch the India Component of the 'Nationally Determined Contributions (NDC)-Transport Initiative for Asia'?
explanation:
The think tank of India, NITI Aayog is set to virtually launch the India Component of the Nationally Determined Contributions (NDC)-Transport Initiative for Asia (TIA).
This discussion will have a main focus on the challenges faced by the Indian transport sector and how they are related to the Carbon dioxide reduction ambitions. This will also provide technical support on reducing Green House Gas emission.
